DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate efficacy Adductor-Canal-Blockade versus Femoral Nerve Block muscle strength , pain mobilization total knee arthroplasty . We hypothesize Adductor-Canal-Blockade effect pain morphine consumption Femoral Nerve Block , without reduction quadriceps muscle strength .
DOC.brief_title: Adductor-Canal-Blockade Versus Femoral Nerve Block Effect Muscle Strength , Pain Mobilization After Total Knee Replacement
